issue.title: [R] Add binding for case_when()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13200](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13200). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-13064 adds a `case_when` kernel that works like a SQL `CASE WHEN` expression. This allows us to implement a binding for the `dplyr` function `case_when()`.
